sections.Biography:
===Background===
Errold Holt hails from [[White Harbor]].

==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
Errold arrives at [[Castle Black]] alongside [[Corlys Wells]] and [[Britt Warrick]].<ref>"[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"</ref>
